duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first level troubleshooting skills to resolve general internal Penske system support issues with Penske's corporate office and field location users via telephone and remote communication tools.
Log all support calls into the call tracking system
Work with programming staff to communicate software issues
Follow-up with callers to ensure customer satisfaction
Work on special projects and laptop software configuration

education_certification.credential: Vocational/Technical or certification required, Bachelor's Degree preferred, A+ Technical Certifications preferred
